description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Live the Clone Wars and play as your favorite Jedi and Clone Trooper in a brand-new story.  Leap and slice your way through enemy lines with the acrobatic power of a Jedi.  Wield an arsenal of elite Clone Trooper weapons -- from rocket launchers to thermal detonators.  Fight alongside your friend on any mission, at any time with drop-in/drop-out co-op gameplay.
description.short: Live the Clone Wars and play as your favorite Jedi and Clone Trooper in a brand-new story.  Leap and slice your way through enemy lines with the acrobatic power of a Jedi.  Wield an arsenal of elite Clone Trooper weapons -- from rocket launchers to thermal detonators.  Fight alongside your friend on any mission, at any time with drop-in/drop-out co-op gameplay.

media.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes
